summary: Arriving on a deserted beach in the Mediterranean sea, in a time and a place unspecified, Kaspar Hauser is forced to confront the evil of a Grand Duchess who feels threatened by the power she exercises over the community.
cast: Claudia Gerini|Vincent Gallo|Fabrizio Gifuni|Elisa Sednaoui|Silvia Calderoni|Marco Lampis|Tonino Fenu
title: La leggenda di Kaspar Hauser
